setRemind

public void setRemind(boolean bool,
                      Constants.Duration duration)
Turns the update reminder off if bool is false.

Parameters:
bool - - whether to turn update reminders off or not
duration - - used to specify length of time not to remind. 0 is 1 day, 1 is 1 week, and 2 is 1 month

getRemind

public boolean getRemind()
Returns:
- true if reminders are on, false otherwise

Parameters:
key - - the key number input by the user from 1 to 36
